item.title: Unveiling the Hidden: Online Vectorized HD Map Construction with Clip-Level Token Interaction and Propagation
item.description: MapUnveiler: a novel paradigm for online vectorized HD map construction that leverages clip-level token interaction and propagation to unveil hidden map elements and achieve state-of-the-art performan…
